    • Constructor Detail

      • Transaction

        public Transaction(int id,
                   java.sql.Date date,
                   Discount discount,
                   float subtotal,
                   float tax,
                   float tip,
                   float total,
                   javagui.Transaction.payment_method paymentMethod,
                   Employee cashier)
        Constructs a new Transaction with the given details.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier for this transaction
        date - the date when the transaction occurred
        discount - the discount applied to the transaction
        subtotal - the subtotal amount of the transaction before tip and tax
        tax - the tax amount applied to the transaction
        tip - the tip amount added to the transaction
        total - the total amount of the transaction including tip and tax
        paymentMethod - the payment method used for this transaction
        cashier - the employee who completed the transaction

      • addTransaction

        public static void addTransaction(java.sql.Timestamp date,
                                  Discount discount,
                                  float subtotal,
                                  float tax,
                                  float tip,
                                  float total,
                                  javagui.Transaction.payment_method paymentMethod,
                                  Employee cashier,
                                  java.util.HashMap<MenuItem,java.lang.Integer> menuItems,
                                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> modificationIDs)
        Adds a new transaction to the database with the given details and updates the inventory and weekly accounting accordingly.
        Parameters:
        date - the date when the transaction occurred
        discount - the discount applied to the transaction
        subtotal - the subtotal amount of the transaction before tip and tax
        tax - the tax amount applied to the transaction
        tip - the tip amount added to the transaction
        total - the total amount of the transaction including tip and tax
        paymentMethod - the payment method used for this transaction
        cashier - the employee who completed the transaction
        menuItems - a HashMap of MenuItem objects and their quantities
        modificationIDs - a list of modification IDs

      • getSalesByItem

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,javagui.SalesReportItem> getSalesByItem(java.sql.Date startDate,
                                                                                         java.sql.Date endDate)
        Retrieves all transactions from the database within the given date range, grouped by item.
        Parameters:
        startDate - the start date of the range
        endDate - the end date of the range
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Transaction objects within the given date range
